scenes.title: Scene 1: Busy Intersection
scenes.description: The video shows a busy intersection in the city with cars ready to cross the street.

scenes.title: Scene 2: Green Light
scenes.description: The traffic light turns green and cars start moving forward.

scenes.title: Scene 3: Continued Drive
scenes.description: Cars proceed through the intersection, and pedestrians wait to cross.

scenes.title: Scene 4: Pedestrians Walking
scenes.description: A green light is visible and pedestrians are walking across the street.

scenes.title: Scene 5: Crosswalk Traffic
scenes.description: A man and woman cross the street while a traffic light shows the countdown.

scenes.title: Scene 6: Business District
scenes.description: A man in a suit walks across a crosswalk in a business district with various vehicles parked nearby.

scenes.title: Scene 7: School Bus and Truck
scenes.description: A school bus and a white truck are parked alongside the road with tall buildings in the background.

scenes.title: Scene 8: School Zone
scenes.description: A view from the car shows a school zone area with cars driving through and buildings on either side.

scenes.title: Scene 9: Clear Road
scenes.description: The view shows a clear road ahead with buildings on either side.

scenes.title: Scene 10: Businessman and Traffic
scenes.description: A businessman crosses the street, and there is an NYPD car and traffic in the background. The street sign indicates E 68 St.

scenes.title: Scene 11: E 68 St Crosswalk
scenes.description: People crossing the street at E 68 St with an NYPD car visible to the right. The video shows a bustling city environment with various pedestrians and vehicles.

scenes.title: Scene 12: City Crosswalk and Red Light
scenes.description: The frame shows a city intersection at E 68 St with pedestrians crossing and a red SUV driving through. The NYPD car is still visible on the right side of the frame.

scenes.title: Scene 13: Evening on E 68 St
scenes.description: The intersection at E 68 St seen from a low angle, as a white sedan crosses and pedestrians wait. The light is red and buildings on either side reflect the evening sun.

scenes.title: Scene 14: Evening Crosswalk
scenes.description: Pedestrians cross the street at E 68 St as the traffic light remains red. NYPD cars are visible on the right, and various other cars are waiting or passing through.

scenes.title: Scene 15: Traffic and Pedestrians at Dusk
scenes.description: The video captures a white van crossing the intersection while several pedestrians walk across, with an NYPD car parked on the right.

scenes.title: Scene 16: Evening Continuing Traffic
scenes.description: People continue to cross the street, with city buildings and traffic forming the backdrop. The intersection is lively with pedestrians and cars.

scenes.title: Scene 17: Green Light on E 68 St
scenes.description: Pedestrians and vehicles cross the intersection at E 68 St under a green light, with various buildings in the background and an NYPD car visible to the right.

scenes.title: Scene 18: Afternoon Transit
scenes.description: Pedestrians cross the street at E 68 St as cars and buses move through the intersection under a green light, with buildings and an NYPD car visible in the background.

scenes.title: Scene 19: Evening Transition
scenes.description: Pedestrians and vehicles continue to cross the intersection at E 68 St, with the evening sun still illuminating the buildings and the street.

scenes.title: Scene 20: Street View
scenes.description: A green light at E 68 St with an NYPD car moving forward on the right side and pedestrians walking on the sidewalk.
